title: Fail to build Cargo

labels.name: T-cargo
labels.description: Relevant to the cargo team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Tried to set parameter 'extended' as true in config.toml, then run ./x.py build and get following error. If comment 'extended', ' ./x.py build' runs well, but cargo can't be run -- cargo command not found'. Any ideas to fix it?

running: "cc" "-O2" "-ffunction-sections" "-fdata-sections" "-fPIC" "-ffunction-sections" "-fdata-sections" "-fPIC" "-I" "/usr/local/include" "-Wall" "-Wextra" "-E" "/rust/build/s390x-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2-tools/s390x-unknown-linux-gnu/release/build/openssl-sys-d699f3753fdbfeb1/out/expando.c"
exit code: 0
cargo:rustc-cfg=osslconf="OPENSSL_NO_SSL3_METHOD"
cargo:conf=OPENSSL_NO_SSL3_METHOD

--- stderr
thread 'main' panicked at '

This crate is only compatible with OpenSSL 1.0.1, 1.0.2, and 1.1.0, or LibreSSL
2.5 and 2.6.0, but a different version of OpenSSL was found. The build is now
aborting due to this version mismatch.

', /root/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-eae4ba8cbf2ce1c7/openssl-sys-0.9.24/build.rs:486:9
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.

warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed


command did not execute successfully: "/rust/build/s390x-unknown-linux-gnu/stage0/bin/cargo" "build" "--target" "s390x-unknown-linux-gnu" "-j" "4" "--release" "--manifest-path" "/rust/src/tools/cargo/Cargo.toml"
expected success, got: exit code: 101


failed to run: /rust/build/bootstrap/debug/bootstrap build
Build completed unsuccessfully in 0:24:46
